title: What happens when you get "drop hacked"?
body:
I was playing some SoloQ, minding my own business, getting beaten pretty severely, then all of a sudden I couldn't move or cast abilities, and now, I've been trying to reconnect for the last half an hour.

I don't think drop hacks would happen in plat 5? would they? If not, what is happening?

replies.body: I had that problem, all of a sudden my cursor turned red, I could still chat and move, but I couldnt enter menu or shop or cast abilities and auto attack. Is this drop hack?

I think drop hacks simply deny you from using basic functions of the game (i.e chat in champ select) and people affected find in lane they stop being able to cast abilities or move (and type to tell people about it)
No. Crashes the server and port hosting the game so anything connecting in to it (players) will be unable to.
I must be thinking of something else

He Zel.

:) 

How is your day going?
